description: Manually curated decision maker relationships - hiring managers and key connections

decision_makers.name: Johannes Spors

decision_makers.notes: Club president during Blessin's tenure

decision_makers.notes: Sporting director who announced Kovac's appointment on three-year contract starting July 1, 2018

decision_makers.notes: Director of Football at Real Sociedad who appointed Alonso on June 1, 2019

decision_makers.name: Alexander Rosen
decision_makers.notes: Director of football who appointed Hoeneß from Bayern Munich II in July 2020

decision_makers.name: Fabian Wohlgemuth
decision_makers.notes: Sporting director who permanently appointed Werner on October 24, 2019 after interim spell

decision_makers.name: Oliver Ruhnert
decision_makers.notes: Managing director of professional football who appointed Fischer in June 2018

decision_makers.name: Benjamin Schmedes

decision_makers.notes: Head of Sport who appointed Thioune from VfL Osnabrück in 2020 on two-year contract

decision_makers.name: Markus Krösche

decision_makers.notes: Promoted Hjulmand from assistant to head coach in summer 2011, led to first Superliga title in 2012

decision_makers.name: Christian Heidel
decision_makers.notes: Appointed Hjulmand as Thomas Tuchel's successor on May 15, 2014, dismissed after less than a year

decision_makers.notes: Promoted Rose from U-19 coach to first team head coach on June 15, 2017

decision_makers.notes: Appointed Riera as assistant coach in August 2020 at Galatasaray

decision_makers.name: Peter Møller

decision_makers.notes: Sporting director who approved Şahin's return to BVB as assistant

decision_makers.notes: Appointed Kompany as player-manager on May 19, 2019

decision_makers.notes: Appointed Riera on July 20, 2023, left with team top of table on Oct 11

decision_makers.name: Fabian Wohlgemuth
decision_makers.notes: Sporting director who appointed Kwasniok to succeed Steffen Baumgart on July 1, 2021

decision_makers.notes: Sporting director who promoted Baum from youth coach to first team on December 14, 2016

decision_makers.name: Marinko Jurendić
decision_makers.notes: Sporting director who appointed Baum as interim coach until end of 2025/26 season

decision_makers.name: Holger Sanwald
decision_makers.notes: Appointed Schmidt as interim coach on September 17, 2007, made permanent after securing promotion

decision_makers.name: Pirmin Schwegler
decision_makers.notes: New sporting director who made Bauer permanent on contract through June 2027, December 2025

decision_makers.name: Roland Virkus
decision_makers.notes: Sporting director who appointed Polanski as reserve team coach in May 2022

decision_makers.name: Roland Virkus
decision_makers.notes: Promoted Polanski from interim to permanent head coach on contract through 2028 in November 2025

decision_makers.name: Christoph Freund
decision_makers.notes: Appointed Rose as youth coach in July 2013, oversaw progression from U16 to U18 to U19 (UEFA Youth League winners 2017)

decision_makers.name: Jochen Sauer
decision_makers.notes: Appointed Hoeneß as U19 head coach in July 2017 from RB Leipzig U17

decision_makers.name: Jochen Saier
decision_makers.notes: Appointed Schuster as coordinator of talent management in July 2018, liaison coach between U19/U23/first team

decision_makers.name: Andreas Gerber
decision_makers.notes: Appointed Fischer as head coach on January 1, 2013, led to Europa League group stage qualification
